titleStmt.title: An excellent new song, called, The ruined virgin, or, The hard-hearted young-man. To an excellent new play-house tune. With allowance.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for, and sold by Charles Barnet,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "You pretty maidens all I pray give ear ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
